pullRequest.title: on phase change, update gun emplacements
pullRequest.bodyText: Because gun emplacements don't actually take damage, there's no 'entity update' when they take a crit during weapons fire. They do get updated during a phase change, so we'll refresh the sprite at that point to avoid extra network chattiness (it's possible that an emplacement gets crit during the movement phase, but fairly unlikely).

commit.message: on phase change, update gun emplacements
